action.action-desc: Mr. Pfluger (for himself, Ms. Mace, Mr. Ellzey, Mr. Donalds, Mr. Arrington, Mr. Hamadeh of Arizona, Mr. Timmons, Mr. Schmidt, Ms. Boebert, Ms. Tenney, and Mr. Guest) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To prohibit individuals who are not citizens of the United States from voting in elections in the District of Columbia and to repeal the Local Resident Voting Rights Amendment Act of 2022.

section.header: Prohibiting voting by noncitizens in District of Columbia Elections
section.text: An individual who is not a citizen of the United States may not vote in an election for public office in the District of Columbia or in any ballot initiative or referendum in the District of Columbia.

section.header: Repeal of Local Resident Voting Rights Amendment Act of 2022
section.text: The Local Resident Voting Rights Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24â€“242) is repealed, and any provision of law amended or repealed by such Act shall be restored or revived as if such Act had not been enacted into law.
